subject: Missing delivery order SSN4610
description_text:
Hello, I ordered the pedals on December 10 order SSN4610.

The tracking number of the delivery is SF6047154799645 and it says
delivered, however I have not been home in the last days and have not
received the package.

There is no notification on the letterbox if the package is at a holding
station.

I cannot contact the customer service of the delivery company as it
requires a Chinese phone number to contact them, but I am in Germany.

Please advise for information, as I am missing my package and it was a lot
of money.

Thanks,
Vasilis.
